SEARCH
Package it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.control.statistics

Interface ISummaryCalculator<T extends Transaction>

Type Parameters:
T - transaction type
All Known Implementing Classes:
SummaryCalculator
public interface ISummaryCalculator<T extends Transaction>
Calculates aggregated totals for a set of transactions: total income, total expense, and net.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    expense(List<T> txs)
    Computes the total expense across the provided transactions.
    double
    income(List<T> txs)
    Computes the total income across the provided transactions.
    double
    net(List<T> txs)
    Computes the overall net value combining income and expense.

  • Method Details

    • income

      double income(List<T> txs)
      Computes the total income across the provided transactions.
      Parameters:
      txs - the transactions to analyze
      Returns:
      the sum of amounts classified as income

    • expense

      double expense(List<T> txs)
      Computes the total expense across the provided transactions.
      Parameters:
      txs - the transactions to analyze
      Returns:
      the sum of amounts classified as expenses

    • net

      double net(List<T> txs)
      Computes the overall net value combining income and expense.
      Parameters:
      txs - the transactions to analyze
      Returns:
      the net result (e.g., income - expense if expense is a positive magnitude)
